text.text:
Garden Rhapsody at Gardens by the Bay is a stunning light and sound show. The Supertrees light up beautifully in sync with music, creating a magical experience.

üå≥ Beautiful Lights ‚Äì The trees glow in colorful lights.
üéµ Relaxing Music ‚Äì The music makes it even more special.
üåå Perfect Spot ‚Äì Great for taking photos and enjoying the night view.

Don‚Äôt miss this free show when you visit Gardens by the Bay!

text.text: Fantastic display of music and light. We arrived with plenty of time to get a good seat under the tree groves. The nighttime display was truly enjoyable with great music selection and amazing colors. This is a must visit when visiting Singapore.

originalText.text: Fantastic display of music and light. We arrived with plenty of time to get a good seat under the tree groves. The nighttime display was truly enjoyable with great music selection and amazing colors. This is a must visit when visiting Singapore.

text.text:
Christmas show is wonderful at night.
Several times after dark.
Tickets are available, but the show can be viewed from several wonderfully  FREE , great vantage points!!
Restrooms available
Handicap doable and recommended
Food and drinks available.
Final take....HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

text.text: It‚Äôs good entertainment, although expected a bit more advanced light show, and it can get quite crowded. I‚Äôd rather recommend the light show by the Marina next to the Apple Store.

originalText.text: It‚Äôs good entertainment, although expected a bit more advanced light show, and it can get quite crowded. I‚Äôd rather recommend the light show by the Marina next to the Apple Store.

text.text: I spent 10 hours out of the Gardens today and saw all five of the paid attractions plus a match of the free areas of the garden.  I did not even know about the show, but had planned to stay to see what all of the Supertrees look like at night time.  I just happened to be there for the 7:45 show.  It was so incredible that I went to a different location to watch the 8:45 show as well.  Planning to go back one evening to schedule being up in the skywalk or observation area during the show.  That must be even more magical.
